quote: For $20 a month, you can upload a photo of a listing to AI and get a detailed description that includes architectural style and surrounding features.
why_clipworthy: Demonstrates a practical use of AI that can immediately benefit agents.
suggested_hook: Discover how a simple $20 tool can transform your listing descriptions!

quote: Layer digital ads on top of your physical farming efforts for maximum impact.
